Dialogue.text: I cannot remember anything. Seem like I drank quite a lot huh?
Should walk a bit to make the dizzines go away.

Dialogue.name: System
Dialogue.text: Right click to walk.\n Left click to Interact with object.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Seem like it need a keycard to unlock.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Why I need a keycard to unlock it from inside?.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Guess it is time to do the laundry.
